content: great little organizer for all your crochet supplies it even holds a mason jar for your scraps i love it so much i have 2 one by my living room and one in my office the finished organizer is approximately 4 inches tall x 8 inches wide **gauge is 5 stitches by 5 row equals 1 5 inches square** i crochet very tightly so depending on your crochet style and materials used this measurement may/will vary i have seen many need to go down a size or two to make gauge this crochet pattern is written in english using us crochet terms do not re sell including translations to other languages do not redistribute including publishing on the internet feel free to sell your finished items please feel free to contact me for any questions sign up for my monthly newsletter to keep updated on new release sales and such https //southerngalscrochet com/newsletter
